name: Shawarma Master 2055 VR
description:
Shawarma Master 2055 is a VR arcade game lets you experience being a shawarma master in 2055!

You will work under the greedy evil boss of Robowarma 

Meet the boss

The boss will order you to get a random amount of points at a certain time either you get or you will be fired!

You get points by serving  shawarma to customers

Slice meat

Collect meat

Serve

*This game requires SteamVR to run and tested on oculus rift but should work fine on other devices  👍

Enjoy serving shawarma!  Develop by @AbdullahZeer27
